Class PropertyManager

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class PropertyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A container that allows external querying of properties

      • hasProperty

                  java.lang.String propertyName,
                  ExpressionType expectedType)
        Checks existence for a property on a variable.
        Parameters:
        variableName - the variable name that contains the property
        propertyName - the property name to get
        expectedType - the expected type of the property
        Returns:
        true if the property exists and if it is the expected type
